creditline: The Ruth Ann Dayton Chinese Room Endowment Fund, The Suzanne S. Roberts Fund for Asian Art, and The Helen Jones Fund for Asian Art
description: top section: applique border design surrounding two squares (approx 3 1/2") in reds, green, white and gray; lower panel has center square (approx. 6") surrounded in 3 sides by similar applique on red, embroidered with green, purple, pink and white; border on 4 sides by applied narrow tape in multicolors; patterned lining
title: Baby Carrier
